definitions.definition: Returning quickly to original shape after force is applied; elastic . ( of objects or substances )

subdefinitions.definition: Having the ability to absorb energy when deformed.

definitions.definition: Returning quickly to normal after damaging events or conditions. ( of systems , organisms or people )

subdefinitions.definition: Having the ability to recover from mental illness , trauma , etc.; having resilience .

main_definition: Returning quickly to original shape after force is applied; elastic . ( of objects or substances )
secondary_definitions: Returning quickly to normal after damaging events or conditions. ( of systems , organisms or people )
